ModMetaData.name: Gemstones
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
More gemstones for more sparkly bases!
Semiprecious stones: amethyst, chalcedony, citrine, garnet, lapis, quartz, serpentine, and turquoise. Stats are similar to vanilla jade. These gems can be mined, purchased, or deep drilled.
Precious stones: diamond, emerald, ruby, and sapphire. These are rare, valuable, and beautiful. Precious stones cannot be found as surface ore, but only deep drilled or traded for.
